function.name: fetch_internet_information
function.description: This function allows you to get current information from Internet websites.

query.description: The description of what you're searching for in a few words.

function.name: fetch_wikipedia_information
function.description: This function allows you to get information from Wikipedia. Use this function to do research on Wikipedia.

wikipedia_query.description: The name or very short description (one or two, three words) of what you're looking for.
